nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. West wind around 2 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 8am and 9am, then rain. Cloudy, with a high near 42. East wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Rain And Snow then Chance Rain And Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Rain before 10pm, then rain and snow between 10pm and midnight, then a chance of rain and snow between midnight and 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. North wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
